resolution.docs:
**int**: An optional resolution from 9 to 12. Higher means more accurate. Defaults to the maximum for most Dallas temperature sensors: 12.

*See also: [Dallas Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas_temp.html#configuration-variables)*

one_wire_id.docs:
**[1-Wire Bus](https://esphome.io/components/one_wire.html#one-wire)**: The ID of the 1-Wire bus to use. Required if there is more than one bus.

*See also: [Dallas Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas_temp.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The address of the sensor. Required if there is more than one device on the bus.

*See also: [Dallas Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas_temp.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval that the sensors should be checked. Defaults to 60 seconds.

*See also: [Dallas Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/dallas_temp.html#configuration-variables)*
